name: Last Episode of Season 1: Farewell to Chloe as we recap all of our favourite memories | The Adults Corner
summary: Wow, time flies when you are having fun. We can't believe we have come to the end of Season 1 of "The Adults Corner". We bid farewell to Chloe during this episode and recap all of our stories and adventures in this episode. We would like to thank Chloe for her time on the podcast as we are sure she will be truely missed.BUT DON'T STRESS, the podcast will return with your host, owner and creator Cherry Dana. You can be sure it will be fun, entertaining, informative and more.Be sure to stay up to date by following us on our socials where we post video and photo recaps: www.linktr.ee/cherrydtv@theadultscorner
